ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
3/4 cup uncooked regular long-grain white rice
n: One Dish Chicken and Rice Bake
des: "Chicken and rice paired with a creamy mushroom sauce bake together for a delicious one-dish meal that's easy to clean up."
ins:
Mix soup, water, rice, paprika and black pepper in 2-quart shallow baking dish.  Top with chicken.  Season with additional paprika and pepper. Cover.
Bake at 375 degrees F 45 minutes or until done.
